channel.title: nww items
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "nww items" - 1.if i don't loop, can i still fight and get nww items? 2. if the timer runs out, can i still loop?

item.title: Re: nww items
item.content:encoded:
It's been a while since I looped but I was fairly certain I was still doing NWW fights up to the day I looped on day 34 or so of my timerâ€¦I think that was before S1 NWW items looped, on the other hand. Perhaps it's been changed since then?

Also, though that method does work and you would still be able to get the S2 NWW items after that during that season ( I believe ), you'd have to wait until you loop again to get the Warstruck theme. Just a heads up in case you were thinking of using it at some point.

item.title: Re: nww items
item.content:encoded:
1 No
2 you loop timer u just get a penility if u dont loop like not being able to help ur village and fight in the war, u can still loop after the timer activates

dont worry about getting the nww itwms first time round I didnt and looped and can still get them in s2 for the letter of marque

item.title: nww items
item.content:encoded: just want the answers of above questions!
